column1: pdf printable version facts. born: november 9, 1931. place of birth: rockport, west virginia. death: june 12, 2015. place of death: parkersburg, west virginia. occupation: electrician. hobbies: hunting, fishing, gardening, visiting old and new friendsservices. funeraltuesday june 16, 2015, 2:00 p. m. at lambert-tatman funeral home: pike street visitation. monday june 15, 2015, 2:00-4:00 p. m. - 6:00-8:00 p. m. at lambert-tatman funeral home: pike street memorial networks partner provider: batesville interactive, all rights reserved. funeral home website by batesville, inc. privacy terms of use
